name: B. Grab the Candies
statement:
Mihai and Bianca are playing with bags of candies. They have a row a of
n bags of candies. The i-th bag has a_i candies. The bags are given to
the players in the order from the first bag to the n-th bag. If a bag
has an even number of candies, Mihai grabs the bag. Otherwise, Bianca
grabs the bag. Once a bag is grabbed, the number of candies in it gets
added to the total number of candies of the player that took it. Mihai
wants to show off, so he wants to reorder the array so that at any
moment (except at the start when they both have no candies), Mihai will
have candies than Bianca. Help Mihai find out if such a reordering
exists.
